column4: i need scan some documents from HP 4800 anyone know how i can do that this ?
hmm ?
What happens when you plug the scanner to your PC?
I didn't do much but you're welcome
Use xsane or iscan
nice xsane works perfectly for me !
Awesome
its very nice
on windows i had a bigger problems with drivers for Vista...and now on linux is very easy and very nice :))
Glad to hear you have it working now
mmm but i scanned it ..but i cant open it..because it say that i dont have permissions
Open what?
scanned pictures
You didn't run xsane as root or with sudo, did you?
i run it as root
Don't do that :/
Now you have to change the permissions of your picture folder back to user
yes it say me that is very dangerous but...hmm
i tought that if i not run xsane as root i will cannot scan

Well now that you've already run it as root, you might not be able to run it as user because of permission problems. But you should always assume you can do anything as user unless you know exactly why you must be root to do it
i scan it again as user :D
